sentence.Network_en: An aspiratded blade - alveolar affricate. It is an aspirated equivalent of [ z ] .
sentence.Network_cn: 舌尖前送气塞擦音. 是与z相对应的 关气音.

sentence.Network_en: This is an unaspirated voiceless palatal affricate.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from Latin affricatus, past participle of affricare, from ad- 'to' + fricare 'to rub'

means.word_mean: 1. a composite speech sound consisting of a stop and a fricative articulated at the same point (as `ch' in `chair' and `j' in `joy')
